name: Infant Program
description: For infants aged six weeks to one year old from 8am - 5pm. Children's activities occur in a calming auditory environment, conducive to their development, and provides ample space for independent play, movement, and exploration.
fullDescription: For infants aged six weeks to one year old from 8am - 5pm. Children's activities occur in a calming auditory environment, conducive to their development, and provides ample space for independent play, movement, and exploration.
whatTheyOffer: For infants aged six weeks to one year old from 8am - 5pm. Children's activities occur in a calming auditory environment, conducive to their development, and provides ample space for independent play, movement, and exploration.
howToGetIt: For admissions information visit their website. There you can take virtual tour and [register to take an in person tour] (https://www.thegrowingtreeschool.com/cont.phpinquire) and make the follow up appointments to continue the admissions process.
cost: This is a fee based service
